layer.name: Sacrifice
layer.definition: Using what has been given to you for the purpose for which it was given — to benefit others, freely and without expectation of return. Costs you everything with a GUARANTEE of no return (to you). The return goes to others.

questions.text: I intercede for others at cost to myself — time, energy, emotional investment — without expecting them to know or reciprocate.
I share my spiritual wisdom and insights freely, even with people who may never thank me or follow through.
I invest spiritual time in people who cannot repay me — the poor, the difficult, the ungrateful.
questions.principle: Sacrifice targets those who cannot reciprocate

questions.text: I pour out spiritual energy for others' benefit even when my own spiritual tank is not overflowing.
questions.principle: Sacrifice sometimes costs from limited reserves

questions.text: I have given significant spiritual investment to people who later rejected, betrayed, or abandoned me — and I would do it again.
questions.principle: True sacrifice continues despite poor returns
